text: Jean Rebeyrol (14 October 1903 - 25 August 1975) was a French swimmer. He competed in the men's 1500 metre freestyle event at the 1924 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1903 births Category:1975 deaths Category:French male swimmers Category:Olympic swimmers of France Category:Swimmers at the 1924 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Bordeaux
title: Jean Rebeyrol
